title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Meanwhile, cook pancetta until crisp.
Whisk eggs with grated parmesan and pepper.
Drain pasta, toss quickly with pancetta and remove from heat.
Add egg-cheese mixture, tossing until creamy (off heat).
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices, garlic, and ginger for 30+ minutes.
Sear or grill chicken until nearly cooked.
In a pan, saut√© spices briefly, add tomato puree; simmer.
Stir in cream; add chicken and finish cooking.
Adjust salt and serve with rice or naan.

title: Veggie Stir Fry
summary: Crisp vegetables tossed in a savory soy-ginger sauce, served over rice.
instructions: Whisk soy sauce, grated ginger, minced garlic, and a little water; add cornstarch.
Stir-fry veggies over high heat in oil until crisp-tender.
Pour in the sauce; toss until glossy and thickened.
Serve over cooked rice.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned beef in warm tortillas with salsa, lettuce, and cheese.
instructions: Brown beef; drain fat.
Stir in taco seasoning and a splash of water; simmer briefly.
Warm tortillas.
Assemble tacos with beef and toppings.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted sourdough topped with smashed avocado, chili flakes, and lemon.
instructions: Toast bread.
Smash avocado with lemon, salt, and pepper.
Spread on toast; finish with chili flakes and olive oil.

title: Blueberry Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes filled with blueberries and a drizzle of maple syrup.
instructions: Whisk dry ingredients; add milk, egg, and melted butter.
Fold in blueberries.
Cook scoops on a hot greased pan until bubbles form; flip and finish.
Serve with maple syrup.
